markdownRemark.html:
I'm a fullstack software developer working on Ruby on Rails and ReactJS.

I have about 6 years of experience of full stack development for projects like social-media advertisement, ad-management, tourism and healthcare. Experienced in gathering client requirements and giving it reality with most efficient technical solutions. Also keeps interest in leanring new technologies and open-source contribution.

I love coding and like to solve day-2-day problems in the best possible way.

Apart from coding I also love doing the following:

🚓 Travelling 📸 Photography 🥁 Drumming

I currently live in Bhubaneswar, India. 📍
